p: In 2016, Haight et al. reported on an investigation into the suspected F. pinicola complex [ 14]. Based on samples collected in North America, Europe and Asia and phenotypically identified as F. pinicola, four distinct species were identified, with only F. pinicola found in Europe and Asia. The other three species were found in different regions of North America [ 1, 14]. For this reason, articles based on samples collected outside of Europe and Asia were not included in this review article.
